name: CoronavirusAndOtherRespiratoryVirusLabTests
title: Coronavirus and Other Respiratory Virus Lab Tests
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) and other related respiratory virus testing in various specimens.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) and other related respiratory virus testing in various specimens.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
